Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 199th overall pick, by Montreal in 2018...
Traded from Montreal to St. Louis (C) on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: 1B Donald Lamberth, LF Brett Godby. Going to STL: 3B Tyler Hazel, C John Searles)...
Injured on 8/14/2020 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/9/2021 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 7/5/2021 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 3/1/2024 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/17/2025 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/27/2027, off Horacio Testa (NY)...
Was claimed off waivers by Atlanta on 5/17/2027.
Released by Atlanta on 8/4/2027...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/16/2028 to a 1-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 2/10/2029.
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/21/2029.
Hit first career homerun on 6/6/2029, off Evelio Gallegos (KC)...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2030...
1/31/2032: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
